title: Executive Operations Assistant
job_overview:
Position Summary
We’re seeking an experienced and highly dependable Executive Virtual Assistant to provide direct support to our CEO. You’ll play a vital role in streamlining daily operations, managing schedules, and handling key communications—freeing up the CEO to focus on top-priority initiatives. This position calls for strong organizational skills, a high level of discretion, and the ability to manage executive-level responsibilities with professionalism.
Core Responsibilities
– Manage the CEO’s calendar and inbox to ensure smooth scheduling and prompt communication
 – Draft and follow up on emails with clients, partners, and vendors
 – Prepare and organize invoices along with basic financial documentation
 – Maintain up-to-date project tracking in Google Sheets or similar tools
 – Monitor tasks and progress using Asana or related platforms
 – Keep contact lists current and organized
 – Identify and escalate time-sensitive tasks to ensure deadlines are met
 – Coordinate travel plans and logistics as needed
 – Send reminders and follow-ups to maintain workflow Upgrade to see actual infontum
 – Handle sensitive communications and records with complete confidentiality
What We’re Looking For
– Excellent written and spoken English communication skills
 – Experience managing executive calendars, emails, and reports
 – Proven background as an Executive Assistant or Personal Assistant
 – Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
 – Ability to work independently, take initiative, and stay reliable
 – Comfort and professionalism in handling confidential information
Nice to Have
– Familiarity with Google Workspace, Asana, and other productivity tools
 – Confidence in communicating with high-level executives
 – Enthusiasm for mission-focused, growth-oriented work
Why You’ll Love This Role
– Join a supportive, purpose-driven team where your work matters
 – Work closely with the CEO and contribute directly to key objectives
 – Enjoy flexible, remote work with autonomy and trust
 – See tangible results from your contributions every day
Ready to take on a trusted, high-impact role? Apply now and let’s build something great together.
